name: CATRPG 0.1.8 Demo
description:
0.1.8 Update

This update brings an overhaul to the starting down, along with one new area, several new enemies and a ton of background work. Visually everything still works the same but underneath the battle system has gone under an overhaul to make it easier for me to add new backgrounds, bad guys, and just makes the whole process a lot more simple on my end.

I didn't add any new hats this time around, but will do so in the future.

If you'd like to follow along with the updates I post weekly Dev Logs on my discord, lately I have been busy but work has picked back up and the Dev Logs will be coming along once again.

https://discord.gg/qd87xGJ

Please Report any bugs you find below and they'll be noted and fixed, I did some testing myself but more can always be found.
